snippet: Comcast surpassed analysts’ earnings projections while CBS Corporation reported its highest quarterly profits ever.
abstract: Comcast reports second-quarter profit of $1.7 billion, or 65 cents a share, from $1.35 billion, or 50 cents a share, in year-ago quarter; CBS reports second-quarter profit of $472 million, or 76 cents a share, from $427 million, or 65 cents a share, in year-ago quarter.
lead_paragraph: Comcast surpassed analysts’ earnings projections while CBS Corporation reported its highest quarterly profits ever.

headline.main: Comcast and CBS Post Strong Results, Aided by Web
headline.print_headline: Comcast and CBS Post Strong Results, Aided by Web
